summary: Implements a BERT‑based neural model that evaluates an ASR hypothesis against a set of domain‑specific correction candidates, predicts the best matching candidate, and provides data handling, loss computation, training, and inference for spellchecking and customization of speech transcription outputs.
business_intent: Enhance speech‑to‑text accuracy by automatically correcting transcription errors with domain‑aware suggestions, improving user experience and downstream NLP applications.
